english_translation: Life is an unfailing spring, a well of deep experience;
The share they get is like what they scoop with their cupped hands.

kannada_original: ಎಷ್ಟೊ ಬಿಂದಿಗೆ ಗಾತ್ರ ಅಷ್ಟು ತುಂಬಿದೆ ಸರಕು;
english_transliteration: Eṣṭo bindige gātra aṣṭu tumbide saraku;
english_translation: Whatever the size of the pot, that much commodity is filled;
The water is like what has been drawn (from the well) – Muddu Rama.
